summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CRM Fase 1.1 improvements. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend mostly working with one critical LeadModal issue preventing access to new lead fields.

ui_bugs.issue: Select component runtime error preventing access to Details tab
ui_bugs.error_details: A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string. This prevents users from accessing new lead fields in Details tab.

integration_issues.issue: Cannot access new fields (propietario, servicios, fuente, urgencia) due to modal tab error

passed_tests: Backend: All 15 API endpoints working (100% success)
Dashboard: Shows seguimientos del d√≠a correctly
Pipeline: All 7 Kanban columns present and functional
Pipeline: Drag & drop between columns working
Admin: User list and CRUD operations working
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix LeadModal Select component error that prevents access to Details tab. The error 'A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string' is blocking users from editing new lead fields (propietario, servicios, fuente, urgencia, motivo_perdida, proximo_seguimiento, tipo_seguimiento).

success_percentage.frontend: 80% (Dashboard, Pipeline, Admin working; LeadModal has critical issue)
